Generation VIII.Sword: Five of them are troopers, and one is the brass. The brass's orders are absolute.
Generation VIII.Shield: The six of them work together as one Pokémon. Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they constantly change their formation as they fight.

Generation IX.Scarlet: The brass, which is the one that stands at the front and issues orders, is the strongest and smartest of the six.
Generation IX.Violet: The leader, known as the brass, uses its extendible horn to issue orders to the others when it's time to change formation.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 8 , Lake of Outrage Dusty Bowl , North Lake Miloch , Rolling Fields , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 8 , Lake of Outrage Dusty Bowl , North Lake Miloch , Rolling Fields , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Frostpoint Field , Giant's Bed , Snowslide Slope , Frigid Sea , Ballimere Lake ( Max Raid Battle ) Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure )

Generation IX.Scarlet: West Province: Area One , Area Two North Province: Area Two East Province: Area Three ( Steel Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ , 5★ )
Generation IX.Violet: West Province: Area One , Area Two North Province: Area Two East Province: Area Three ( Steel Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ , 5★ )
